text:
Bruno Grandi (May 9, 1934 – September 13, 2019) was an Italian sportsman. He was president of the FIG (Federation Internationale de Gymnastique) from 1996–2016 and was a member of the International Olympic Committee from 2000 to 2004. He was born in Forlì, Emilia Romagna.
Grandi died in Italy after an illness at age 85.
